36 template<class Archive>
37 struct archive_tag;

39 template<class tag>
40 struct archive_helper {
41  template<class Base>
42  class BaseClass;
43  template<class Base, class Derived>
44  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d);
45 
46  template<class Object>
47  class NameValuePair;
48  template<class Object>
49  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &d);
50 
51  template<class T>
52  class ArrayWrapper;
53  template<class T, class S>
54  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny=1, S nz=1);
55 
56  template<class Archive>
57  class StreamType;
58 };
59 
60 template<class Base, class Derived, class Archive>
61 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(const Archive &, Derived &d) {
62  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template serialize_base<Base>(d);
63 }
64 
65 template<class Archive, class Object>
66 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &d) {
67  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::make_nvp(name, d);
68 }
69 
70 template<class Archive, class T, class S>
71 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny=1, S nz=1) {
72  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::wrap_array(t, exact, nx, ny, nz);
73 }

97 template <>
98 struct archive_helper<boost_tag> {
99  template<class Base>
100  using BaseClass = Base &;
101  template<class Base, class Derived>
102  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d) {
103  return boost::serialization::base_object<Base>(d);
104  }
105 
106  template<class Object>
107  using NameValuePair = const boost::serialization::nvp<Object>;
108  template<class Object>
109  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &obj) {
110  return boost::serialization::make_nvp(name, obj);
111  }
112 
113 #if BOOST_VERSION > 105300
114  template<class T>
115  using ArrayWrapper = const boost::serialization::array_wrapper<T>;
116 #else
117  template<class T>
118  using ArrayWrapper = const boost::serialization::array<T>;
119 #endif
120  template<class T, class S>
121  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny, S nz) {
122  return boost::serialization::make_array(t, nx*ny*nz);
123  }
124 };
125 }

161 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
162 struct ZfpParameters {
163  FieldCompressionMode mode = Uncompressed;
164  double rate = 8.;
165  int precision = 20;
166  double accuracy = 1e-20;
167 };
168 
169 template<typename T>
170 struct zfp_type_map {
171  static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_none;
172 };
173 
174 template<> struct zfp_type_map<int32_t> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_int32; };
175 template<> struct zfp_type_map<int64_t> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_int64; };
176 template<> struct zfp_type_map<float> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_float; };
177 template<> struct zfp_type_map<double> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_double; };
178 
179 template<zfp_type type>
180 bool compressZfp(std::vector<char> &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param);
181 template<zfp_type type>
182 bool decompressZfp(void *dest, const std::vector<char> &compressed, const Index dim[3]);
183 #endif

185 template<>
186 struct archive_helper<yas_tag> {
187  template <class Base>
188  using BaseClass = Base &;
189  template <class Base, class Derived>
190  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d) {
191  return yas::base_object<Base>(d);
192  }

194  template<class Object>
195  using NameValuePair = const Object &;
196  template<class Object>
197  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &obj) {
198  //return YAS_OBJECT_NVP(name, obj);
199  return obj;
200  }
201 
202  template<class T>
203  struct ArrayWrapper {
204  typedef T value_type;
205  typedef T& reference;
206  T *m_begin, *m_end;
207  Index m_dim[3] = {0, 1, 1};
208  bool m_exact = true;
209 
210  ArrayWrapper(T *begin, T *end)
211  : m_begin(begin)
212  , m_end(end)
213  {}
214  T *begin() { return m_begin; }
215  const T *begin() const { return m_begin; }
216  T *end() { return m_end; }
217  const T *end() const { return m_end; }
218  bool empty() const { return m_end == m_begin; }
219  Index size() const { return (Index)(m_end - m_begin); }
220  T &operator[](size_t idx) { return *(m_begin+idx); }
221  const T &operator[](size_t idx) const { return *(m_begin+idx); }
222  void push_back(const T &) { assert("not supported" == 0); }
223  void resize(std::size_t sz) { if (size() != sz) { std::cerr << "requesting resize from " << size() << " to " << sz << std::endl; assert("not supported" == 0); } }
224  void setDimensions(size_t sx, size_t sy, size_t sz) {
225  m_dim[0] = (Index)sx;
226  m_dim[1] = (Index)sy;
227  m_dim[2] = (Index)sz;
228  }
229  void setExact(bool exact) {
230  m_exact = exact;
231  }
232 
233  template<class Archive>
234  void serialize(Archive &ar) const {
235  save(ar);
236  }
237  template<class Archive>
238  void serialize(Archive &ar) {
239  load(ar);
240  }
241  template<class Archive>
242  void load(Archive &ar) {
243  bool compress = false;
244  ar & compress;
245  if (compress) {
246  ar & m_dim[0] & m_dim[1] & m_dim[2];
247  std::vector<char> compressed;
248  ar & compressed;
249 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
250  Index dim[3];
251  for (int c=0; c<3; ++c)
252  dim[c] = m_dim[c]==1 ? 0 : m_dim[c];
253  decompressZfp<zfp_type_map<T>::value>(static_cast<void *>(m_begin), compressed, dim);
254 #endif
255  } else {
256  yas::detail::concepts::array::load<yas_flags>(ar, *this);
257  }
258  }
259  template<class Archive>
260  void save(Archive &ar) const {
261  bool compress = ar.compressionMode()!=Uncompressed && !m_exact;
262  //std::cerr << "ar.compressed()=" << compress << std::endl;
263  if (compress) {
264 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
265  ZfpParameters param;
266  param.mode = ar.compressionMode();
267  param.rate = ar.zfpRate();
268  param.precision = ar.zfpPrecision();
269  param.accuracy = ar.zfpAccuracy();
270  //std::cerr << "trying to compresss " << std::endl;
271  std::vector<char> compressed;
272  Index dim[3];
273  for (int c=0; c<3; ++c)
274  dim[c] = m_dim[c]==1 ? 0 : m_dim[c];
275  if (compressZfp<zfp_type_map<T>::value>(compressed, static_cast<const void *>(m_begin), dim, param)) {
276  ar & compress;
277  ar & m_dim[0] & m_dim[1] & m_dim[2];
278  ar & compressed;
279  } else {
280  std::cerr << "compression failed" << std::endl;
281  compress = false;
282  }
283 #else
284  compress = false;
285 #endif
286  }
287  if (!compress) {
288  ar & compress;
289  yas::detail::concepts::array::save<yas_flags>(ar, *this);
290  }
291  }
292  };
293 
294  template<class T, class S>
295  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny, S nz) {
296  ArrayWrapper<T> wrap(t, t+nx*ny*nz);
297  wrap.setExact(exact);
298  wrap.setDimensions(nx, ny, nz);
299  return wrap;
300  }
301 
302  template<class Archive>
303  using StreamType = typename ArchiveStreamType<Archive>::type;
304 };
305 
306 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
307 template<>
308 bool V_COREEXPORT decompressZfp<zfp_type_none>(void *dest, const std::vector<char> &compressed, const Index dim[3]);
309 
310 template<zfp_type type>
311 bool decompressZfp(void *dest, const std::vector<char> &compressed, const Index dim[3]) {
312 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
313  bool ok = true;
314  bitstream *stream = stream_open(const_cast<char *>(compressed.data()), compressed.size());
315  zfp_stream *zfp = zfp_stream_open(stream);
316  zfp_stream_rewind(zfp);
317  zfp_field *field = zfp_field_3d(dest, type, dim[0], dim[1], dim[2]);
318  if (!zfp_read_header(zfp, field, ZFP_HEADER_FULL)) {
319  std::cerr << "decompressZfp: reading zfp compression parameters failed" << std::endl;
320  }
321  if (field->type != type) {
322  std::cerr << "decompressZfp: zfp type not compatible" << std::endl;
323  }
324  if (field->nx != dim[0] || field->ny != dim[1] || field->nz != dim[2]) {
325  std::cerr << "decompressZfp: zfp size mismatch: " << field->nx << "x" << field->ny << "x" << field->nz << " != " << dim[0] << "x" << dim[1] << "x" << dim[2] << std::endl;
326  }
327  zfp_field_set_pointer(field, dest);
328  if (!zfp_decompress(zfp, field)) {
329  std::cerr << "decompressZfp: zfp decompression failed" << std::endl;
330  ok = false;
331  }
332  zfp_stream_close(zfp);
333  zfp_field_free(field);
334  stream_close(stream);
335  return ok;
336 #else
337  std::cerr << "cannot decompress array: no support for ZFP floating point compression" << std::endl;
338  return false;
339 #endif
340 }
341 #endif
342 
343 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
344 template<>
345 bool V_COREEXPORT compressZfp<zfp_type_none>(std::vector<char> &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param);
346 
347 template<zfp_type type>
348 bool compressZfp(std::vector<char> &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param) {
349 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
350  bool ok = true;
351  int ndims=1;
352  size_t sz = dim[0];
353  if (dim[1] != 0) {
354  ndims=2;
355  sz *= dim[1];
356  }
357  if (dim[2] != 0) {
358  ndims=3;
359  sz *= dim[2];
360  }
361 
362  if (sz < 1000) {
363  std::cerr << "compressZfp: not compressing - fewer than 1000 elements" << std::endl;
364  return false;
365  }
366 
367  zfp_stream *zfp = zfp_stream_open(nullptr);
368  switch (param.mode) {
369  case Uncompressed:
370  assert("invalid mode for ZFP compression" == 0);
371  break;
372  case ZfpAccuracy:
373  zfp_stream_set_accuracy(zfp, param.accuracy);
374  break;
375  case ZfpPrecision:
376  zfp_stream_set_precision(zfp, param.precision);
377  break;
378  case ZfpFixedRate:
379  zfp_stream_set_rate(zfp, param.rate, type, ndims, 0);
380  break;
381  }
382 
383  zfp_field *field = zfp_field_3d(const_cast<void *>(src), type, dim[0], dim[1], dim[2]);
384  size_t bufsize = zfp_stream_maximum_size(zfp, field);
385  compressed.resize(bufsize);
386  bitstream *stream = stream_open(compressed.data(), bufsize);
387  zfp_stream_set_bit_stream(zfp, stream);
388 
389  zfp_stream_rewind(zfp);
390  size_t header = zfp_write_header(zfp, field, ZFP_HEADER_FULL);
391  std::cerr << "compressZfp: wrote " << header << " header bytes" << std::endl;
392  size_t zfpsize = zfp_compress(zfp, field);
393  if (zfpsize == 0) {
394  std::cerr << "compressZfp: zfp compression failed" << std::endl;
395  ok = false;
396  } else {
397  compressed.resize(zfpsize);
398  std::cerr << "compressZfp: compressed " << dim[0] << "x" << dim[1] << "x" << dim[2] << " elements to " << zfpsize << " bytes" << std::endl;
399  }
400  zfp_field_free(field);
401  zfp_stream_close(zfp);
402  stream_close(stream);
403 
404  return ok;
405 #else
406  assert("no support for ZFP floating point compression" == 0);
407  return false;
408 #endif
409 }
410 #endif
411 }
412 #endif

452 boost::serialization::nvp<T> vistle_make_nvp(const char *name, T &t) {

494  friend class boost::serialization::access; \
495  template<class Archive> \
496  void serialize(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) { \
497  boost::serialization::split_member(ar, *this, version); \
498  } \
499  template<class Archive> \
500  void save(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) const { \
501  save(ar); \
502  } \
503  template<class Archive> \
504  void load(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) { \
505  load(ar); \
506  }
507 #else

509 #endif
510 #define YAS_ARCHIVE_ACCESS_SPLIT \
511  public: \

513  void serialize(Archive &ar) const { \
514  save(ar); \
515  } \

517  void serialize(Archive &ar) { \

523 #ifdef USE_BOOST_ARCHIVE

525  virtual void saveToArchive(boost_oarchive &ar) const override; \
526  virtual void loadFromArchive(boost_iarchive &ar) override;
527 #define ARCHIVE_REGISTRATION_BOOST_INLINE \
528  void saveToArchive(boost_oarchive &ar) const override { this->serialize(ar); } \
529  void loadFromArchive(boost_iarchive &ar) override { this->serialize(ar); }
530 #define ARCHIVE_REGISTRATION_BOOST_IMPL(ObjType, prefix) \
531  prefix \
532  void ObjType::saveToArchive(boost_oarchive &ar) const { \
533  this->serialize(ar); \
534  } \
535  prefix \
